courseName: Global Mental Health and Society MSc
facultyName: School of Social and Political Science
description: Programme descriptionGlobal Mental Health - interdisciplinary approaches at EdinburghDo you want to examine how mental health is understood and addressed cross-culturally across the world?Are you interested in the social drivers of poor mental health and ways to address these?Do you want to play a role in transforming mental health care globally?Mental health and well-being are crucial global health and social welfare policy concerns with significant resources and research devoted to this area.This interdisciplinary postgraduate programme offers you opportunities to develop:
